verbs.description: Lest [ARG0: we] [V: forget] [ARGM-LOC: in a swirl of porn - star payoffs , meetings with Kremlin agents and a family business bonanza] , Donald Trump used his charitable foundation as a tax - free piggybank for at least a decade . State Attorney General Barbara Underwood is rightly demanding an end to the charade .
